subject: Career
title: The Cold Outreach Formula
description: A fast breakdown of The Cold Outreach Formula for builders.

hook.text: You email a stranger. They don't respond. You try again with a different approach. They reply in minutes.

buildup.text: Cold outreach fails when it's about you: 'I'd love to pick your brain.' That takes and gives nothing.

discovery.text: Effective outreach leads with value: a relevant insight, a specific compliment, or a useful introduction.

twist.text: Keep it short. Three to four sentences max. Busy people delete long emails without reading them.

climax.text: The formula: genuine compliment + specific ask + easy action. 'I loved your talk on X. Quick question about Y.'

punchline.text: Make it easy to say yes and hard to ignore.

quiz.question: What makes cold outreach effective?
options: Leading with value and a specific, easy ask
